examples.text: its castled hills and the air of romance

definitions: (of the king) moved from its original square two squares along the back rank toward the corner square of a rook, which has been transferred to the square passed over by the king

examples.text: an attack against a castled king is a very important part of the middle game

shortDefinitions: (of king) moved two squares along back rank toward rook, which moves to square passed by king
